Item ID1169

A coif is an improved cowl that requires 20 Ranged to equip. Coifs are the best ranged headgear available for free to play. It can be made at level 38 Crafting with one leather, a needle, and thread.

Making a coif in the Lumbridge cow field is a requirement for the Lumbridge and Draynor medium achievement diary.

[[File:Coif_detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:Coif_chathead.png|left]]
A '''coif''' is an improved [[cowl]] that requires 20 [[Ranged]] to equip. Coifs are the best ranged headgear available for free to play. It can be made at level 38 [[Crafting]] with one [[leather]], a [[needle]], and [[thread]]. 

Making a coif in the [[Lumbridge cow field]] is a requirement for the [[Lumbridge]] and [[Draynor]] [[Lumbridge & Draynor Diary|medium achievement diary]].
